objects.text:
• Premium Textured Leather
• Gold Hardware Accents
• Compact & Functional
• Clip-On Keychain Design
Limited Time Offer • Ends This Week

product_details.name: ALDO Women's Dwendassa Wallet, Dark Beige
product_details.description: This fashionable and functionall change purse easily fits inside or clips onto your favorite handbag.

banner_details:
This promotional banner features a clean and elegant layout with a neutral background that softly blends beige tones and subtle graphic elements such as translucent circles and curved lines, adding visual interest. The centerpiece is a premium wallet product image ("product_image") placed to the right, showcasing its embossed texture and gold detailing.

Text hierarchy is clearly defined: the bold, uppercase headline ("heading") announces a promotional message in a dark brown tone, followed by a lighter, serif subheading ("subheading"). A list of features ("description") is neatly organized with bullet points. The price ("price") is visibly large and emphasizes affordability, with a supporting tagline ("tagline") above it in an elegant serif font. A call-to-action button ("cta_button") with contrasting white text ("cta") draws attention. Below, a limited-time note ("offer_text") reinforces urgency.

**Color Palette:**
- Background beige: `#F0E6DD`
- Secondary tan: `#E6D0C0`
- Accent gold: `#C49A6C`
- Deep brown: `#8A5A2B`
- Rich chocolate: `#5D4037`
- Warm bronze: `#956134`
- Soft gold circle: `#D4B59A`
- Button text: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image features a sophisticated and minimalistic color palette, ideal for creating a classy advertising banner. The main color of the wallet is a muted taupe brown (#B89D8B), offering a neutral and elegant base. The gold metallic hardware and keychains (#D4AF37) provide a luxurious contrast, catching the eye with their reflective sheen. The ALDO logo is also rendered in gold, subtly standing out against the textured leather. These two tones—taupe and gold—are blended harmoniously, maintaining simplicity while highlighting opulence. For balance and depth in design, complementary shades like ivory (#F5F5F5) and soft blush (#EADAC6) can be used.
